CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 26, 1952, page 2, reads: "Harriman Search for Local Delegates - W. Averell Harriman, Mutual Security Administrator and aspirant for the Democratic nomination for President, lunched with Pittsburgh district labor and political leaders last week just prior to going to the convention where the nomination will be made this week. Shown at the speaker's table, left to right, County Commissioner John J. Kane, Anthony J. Federoff, CIO; Pittsburgh Central Labor Union President John A. Fiegel, Mayor David L. Lawrence, W. Averell Harriman, David J. McDonald, secretary-treasurer of the United Steelworkers; the Rev. Charles Owen Rice, and Atty. Richard F. Jones, president of the local branch of the NAACP. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Three men dining at banquet table, left to right: Mayor David L. Lawrence, W. Averell Harriman, and David J. McDonald, in interior with microphone and downtown buildings visible through window
